amendment.description: To amend the Indian Health Care Improvement Act to expand the funding authority for renovating, constructing, and expanding certain facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2133, under the order of 8/2/2021, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 90 - 7. Record Vote Number: 291.

action.text: Amendment SA 2133 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Padilla to Amendment SA 2137. (consideration: CR S5553; text: CR S5553) To amend the Indian Health Care Improvement Act to expand the funding authority for renovating, constructing, and expanding certain facilities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2133 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Padilla to Amendment SA 2137.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2133, under the order of 8/2/2021, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 90 - 7. Record Vote Number: 291.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2133, under the order of 8/2/2021, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 90 - 7. Record Vote Number: 291.
